name: Chapter One A rhythm to take

metadata.name: Young floating mountains, p.1
metadata.description: In the beginning, mountains were floating on the planet Irma. I had been thinking about it for several days, but I was too afraid, afraid of what? Of failure, of leaving the life of the village of Iris, my work and my family to be able to fully dedicate myself to my only desire to discover the world and to advance in this way with all my commitment?
